[enemygroup]
# 2 Skeleton Knights
type=skeletonknight
location=13,9,4,6
level=2,2
number=2,2

[event]
# Teleport to Volcano1
type=teleport
location=0,11,1,6
intermap=volcano1.txt,30,18

[event]
# Fire alert
type=run_once
location=10,5,6,3
msg=There might be a way to cross that small gap, but it looks deadly.
sfx=quake.ogg

[event]
# Lava Trap
type=trap
location=10,3,1,1

power=33
power_damage=100,100
tooltip=Lava River
